sentences.en: My friend seems upset and distrait; it turns out his dad is seriously sick.
sentences.cn: 我朋友看起来心不在焉的， 原来是因为他爸病重。

sentences.en: The distrait actress fluffed her lines.
sentences.cn: 那位心不在焉的女演员忘了台词。

sentences.en: The distrait boy is always losing his books.
sentences.cn: 这个心不在焉的男孩老是丢书。

words.tran_cn: （法）心不在焉的（因烦恼、忧惧等）
